# Planar Exchange (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Calling Spells|calling]]) \[see text for *[[Planar Exchange, Lesser (Spell)|lesser planar exchange]]*]

**Level:** [[6th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 11]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** 0 ft.

**Effect:** One called creature

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 159

This spell functions like *[[Planar Exchange, Lesser (Spell)|lesser planar exchange]]*, except as noted here. You trade places with an avoral guardinal, bone devil, or babau demon. The called creature has full access to all its abilities, with one exception: A demon or devil you conjure canâ€™t summon other creatures. If the creature is slain, you take 3d6 points of damage and the spell ends.
